conclusion: Analyze the schematic diagram and data about the AC generator.
Identify the components of the AC generator: rectangular coil with 100 turns, resistance 10Ω, and resistance R is 90Ω. Magnetic flux varies sinusoidally with time.
Determine the maximum flux from the sinusoidal graph: flux varies between 0 and 2.0 × 10^{-2} Wb, maximum flux is 2.0 × 10^{-2} Wb.
Calculate the maximum EMF using the formula: EMF = 1/2 × Flux × Number of turns × Frequency.
Determine the maximum value of the electromotive force generated by the AC generator is 314 V.
